anyone need help?: can I install ubunto onto an external hd then plug it in when I want to use linux?
yes but you need to install the MBR on your first hard disk if you still want to use Windows (if I am correct)
also you will need a bios that supports booting from a usb hard disk of course (or choosing where to boot from, my compaq presario sr desktop has a boot menu when you hit Esc at bootup)
